about.about_description: Infinity Copper Group is a leading supplier of high-quality copper pipes in Central Asia. Our business is based on meeting customer needs, flexibility in work, and developing new products, solutions, and services based on innovation.

sectionTitle.title: Our Products
sectionTitle.description: ICG.UZ offers high-quality products and solutions based on modern technologies. We strive to provide flexible and innovative services to meet customer needs. Our products are developed with a personalized approach to each client, helping us earn their trust.

sectionTitle.title: Our Partners
sectionTitle.description: Our partners are reliable colleagues working with us. Collaboration with them is of great importance to our company.

aboutHero.title: Infinity Copper Group
aboutHero.description: ICG (Infinity Copper Group) is a leading company in the supply of copper pipes in Uzbekistan. Founded in 2010, it produces copper pipes used in various fields such as automotive, construction, and household appliances. The company offers products based on customer needs and innovations. All products are manufactured from pure mineral raw materials. The company has numerous partners worldwide and prioritizes quality.

aboutInfoFirst.desk: Our activities are based on meeting customer needs, flexibility in work, and innovations in developing new products, solutions, and services. The history of Infinity Copper Group began in 2010 with the construction of a plant for producing copper pipes used in daily life, automotive, construction, and in the manufacture of household air conditioners, refrigerators, and heating devices. This was the first step in developing the Central Asian market for water and gas supply systems.
aboutInfoFirst.title: Infinity Copper Group is a leading supplier of high-quality copper pipes in Central Asia.

aboutInfoSecond.title: To help our clients find solutions with copper pipes that enable them to obtain relevant products, services, and information.
aboutInfoSecond.desk: We offer you quality products. By purchasing products from Infinity Copper Group, you can be confident in the reliability of the equipment. All products of Infinity Copper Group are manufactured only from the purest mineral raw materials, without the use of waste or recycled copper. We operate under the brand name 'Infinity Copper Group' throughout the marketing territory. For us, the strength of our brand comes not from words, but from actions. We promise our customers to deliver quality work and strive daily to achieve this goal. We want our clients to recognize Infinity Copper Group as a symbol of innovation, quality, and customer satisfaction. In all our actions, we take into account the needs of our customers.

header.subtitle: ICG Company in the Global Market
header.title: Our Export Deliveries

exports.description: ICG successfully exports its copper pipes and other products to numerous countries worldwide. The company’s products are distinguished by high quality and are manufactured in accordance with global standards. ICG is recognized as a reliable partner in the international market and makes constant deliveries to many countries. The volume of exports enhances the competitiveness of the company and is widely utilized.
